original: COSTER, Rudolf Reinhold Gustav, Direktör, Hälsinborg, f Gråmanstorp, Krst l, 23/7 79 av insp M G C o Pauline Meijer, gm Ida Peterson. Hal. Fotografelev 95, öl anst i Sv o Tyskl t 08, start eg fotoateljé i Lkrona 08, kompanj i Almquist & Coster vykortsfabr Hbg 17, nu v. dir i dna t AB omb fma. Ag minkfarm i Ramlösa samt fruktträdsodling. Hobbies: Violoncell, golf, vinfabrikant i större omfattn. Om namn ej finnas under C, se även under K,
translated:
COSTER, Rudolf Reinhold Gustav, Director, Helsingborg, born in Gråmanstorp, Christened on July 23, 1879, son of inspector M G C and Pauline Meijer, married to Ida Peterson. Started as a photography apprentice in 1895, became employed in Swedish and German photography studios in 1908, established own photo studio in Landskrona in 1908. Became a partner in Almquist & Coster postcard factory in Helsingborg in 1917, currently holds the position of vice director in AB omb fma. Also owns a mink farm in Ramlösa and engages in fruit tree cultivation. Hobbies: Violoncello, golf, also involved in wine production on a larger scale. If the name is not found under "C," please also check under "K."

Note: the abbreviation '\d\d m. partners name' means that the person got married in the year 19xx.
